pages.title: Pigment Pedestal
pages.text: The **Pigment Pedestal** is the block where you craft most of the recipes for Spectrum.\\To start crafting trigger it with a $(l:general/paintbrush)Paintbrush$() or supply a [#](449900)redstone signal[#]().\It requires air, or an inventory above it.

\Most recipes require $(l:general/gemstone_powder)Gemstone Powder$() as an ingredient.\\The Pedestal also acts as a [#](bb00bb)Crafting Table[#]() and can therefore also be used to craft vanilla recipes.\\You can use a $(l:magical_items/crafting_tablet)Crafting Tablet$() to automate both Spectrum and Vanilla recipes.

pages.title: Variants
pages.text: \The Pigment Pedestal can be built with your gemstone of choice.\\While they do look different they are the same, functionally.
